plot: Harry and Henry are friends. Harry wants a quiet night in. Henry orders a prostitute. Harry sees her and wants to sleep with her. Henry lets him. Harry can't pay for her. Neither can Henry. The prostitute isn't happy. Neither is her pimp.
title: Harry, Henry and the Prostitute
plot_es: Harry and Henry are friends. Harry wants a quiet night in. Henry orders a prostitute. Harry sees her and wants to sleep with her. Henry lets him. Harry can't pay for her. Neither can Henry. The prostitute isn't happy. Neither is her pimp.
plot_en: Harry and Henry are friends. Harry wants a quiet night in. Henry orders a prostitute. Harry sees her and wants to sleep with her. Henry lets him. Harry can't pay for her. Neither can Henry. The prostitute isn't happy. Neither is her pimp.
